name: Mix & match Icebreaker / Open Peeps
description:
The most fun and energizing icebreaker that I have seen is now available for FigJam. Use this warm-up activity before any workshop to get the creative juices flowing.


Open Peeps is an extraordinary illustration library created by Pablo Stanley. In a recent update, he included colors and other improvements.


I took the liberty to customize some of the illustrations with StarWars, SuperMario, and a few products available in the Figma shop.


Quick instructions on how to use this template:

  1. Choose a peep card (The card with the text "Name" on it)
  2. Drag body, head, expression and optional accessories into it
  3. If needed, reorder the parts using brackets [ ]
  4. Yay! That's it.


This FigJam template was inspired by the Facilitator School Miro's template. üëè


Pretty sure you will have lots of fun.

Happy jamming! ‚úåÔ∏è
